select
from snapshots s inner join components p on p.uuid=s.component_uuid and p.enabled=${_true} inner join project_branches pb on pb.uuid=p.uuid where
(pb.project_uuid=#{componentUuidFromDatePair.componentUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and s.created_at >= #{componentUuidFromDatePair.from, jdbcType=BIGINT})
and s.status = 'P' order by s.created_at
